did.unittitle: Beinecke Rare Book and Manuscript Library, Yale University, exhibit records

repository.corpname: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

did.abstract: The materials consist of a videotaped interview with Alfred Van Sinderen regarding the presidential letters exhibition in the Beinecke Rare Book and Manuscript Library at Yale University.

origination.label: creator
origination.corpname: Beinecke Rare Book and Manuscript Library

odd.head: General note
odd.p: Forms part of Yale Record Group 32-D (YRG 32-D), Records of Yale school and departmental libraries and collections.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: The materials are open for research.

Original audiovisual materials, as well as preservation and duplicating masters, may not be played. Researchers must consult use copies, or if none exist must pay for a use copy, which is retained by the repository. Researchers wishing to obtain an additional copy for their personal use should consult Copying Services information on the Manuscripts and Archives web site.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Beinecke Rare Book and Manuscript Library, Yale University, Exhibit Records (RU 199). Manuscripts and Archives, Yale University Library.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Yale University records are arranged and described at the accession level by the creating office. The University Archives creates collection level descriptive records, but typically does no further arrangement and description at the accession level.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The materials consist of a videotaped interview with Alfred Van Sinderen regarding the presidential letters exhibition in the Beinecke Rare Book and Manuscript Library at Yale University.
